page.title: Examples
page.goal: Show what Standard/Growth/Premium look like using the tier toggle showroom. Push users to Pricing → Intake.

sections.headline: See the difference by tier
sections.subheadline: Toggle Standard → Growth → Premium to understand how far each tier goes.
sections.notes: Hero should lead directly into the toggle.

sections.headline: Tier toggle showroom
sections.notes: Embed/feature existing ExamplesViewer with before/after toggle. Ensure toggle labels map exactly to Standard/Growth/Premium. If multiple showrooms exist, use tabs.

sections.headline: What to look for
bullets: Clarity: headline + subheadline communicate in seconds
Proof: trust elements show up at the right time
Mobile: stacking and spacing stay readable
Flow: sections appear in an order that converts
sections.notes: This primes the customer to evaluate correctly.

sections.headline: How tiers differ in practice
sections.notes: 3 cards that match the language from Pricing and How it works. Keep consistent phrasing.

sections.headline: Want this for your site?
sections.subheadline: Start with the intake. We'll generate a plan and preview.

mobileRequirements: Tier toggle must be easy to use on mobile
Ensure embedded preview does not overflow width

mustPass: Tier toggle is present and functional

shouldPass: Examples page drives to Pricing and Intake clearly
